eventParts.text: Do you guys ever think about how long it will take to get back home again?
Yeah. I miss my family, and our business. I liked working there. Everybirdy was so friendly and nice. Not that I don’t like adventuring with you guys!
It’s okay, I think we all miss home. What kind of business was it, Rebecca?
We sold tools and rare seeds for farmers.
My family always buys a bunch of stuff from Rebecca’s family during the harvest festival!
Yeah! It’s nice, you get to meet the same people over and over again, and everybirdy trusts you… I miss it.

eventConsequence.selectionText: I think once we get the seeds it will be easier to get back home again, and then you can continue with your business, Rebecca!
eventConsequence.conclusionText:
Thanks! I look forward to it. 

Rebecca gains +2 social!

eventConsequence.selectionText: I know you miss your home, but a lot has happened during this adventure and it’s not over yet. Maybe you’ll change your mind and not want to be a merchant anymore. It’s all good, no matter what you’d like to do.
eventConsequence.conclusionText:
Yeah, I suppose you’re right. I’m not the same bird I was when we started this quest. I hope my family will still recognize me when I get back home. 

Rebecca gains +2 solitude!
